title: Master1PRO
author: Master1PRO
content: The site has been operational since December 2022.Since March 9, I invested my funds in https://www.gold-quarry.com/.     Description of the projectKnown as the "metal of kings", gold is a precious metal that is still of great value today. Gold is known for retaining its value over the centuries. The unique physical properties of gold are also highly valued. The precious metal is known for its resistance to corrosion and the fact that it can be melted down. This allows you to work with it very quickly or stamp it like a coin. Gold has historically been known for maintaining its value regardless of external political conditions. Whenever there is a political crisis, gold tends to skyrocket. People love the security that investing in gold provides.     Project marketingThe project has two investment plans with a yield of 12% to 20% per month.Gold Market 0.55% per day or (from 12% to 17% per month) for 30 days. Return of the deposit at the end of the term. Min. deposit: from $10Gold Mining 20% per month for 90 days. Return of the deposit at the end of the term. Min. deposit: from $1000     Affiliate programReward: 7-5-3% of the contribution of your partners.No personal contribution is required to participate in the affiliate program.The project also has rewards for publishing a project (review) on your resources, websites and social networks, for which they will pay from $10 to $100     AdditionPayouts: pays manual time limits up to 3 hoursDeposit and withdrawal via: TetherTRC20, BitCoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Payeer, Visa and MasterCard cardsMinimum deposit : 10$Minimum withdrawal of money : 5$>>>> Registration <<<<     PaymentSeptember 8, 2023 1:41 PM - 6.45 USD: https://tronscan.org/#/transaction/fe65e9ae832c3ad09280dd5754d7d7fa87e1f9e791697151eba0d0a41577bda2

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Master1PRO on September 09, 2023, 06:05:59 PM...The project has two investment plans with a yield of 12% to 20% per month...Given the fact that the price of gold has remained stable over the past 5 years, where can the yield equal to 240% per annum come from? This is only explained by the fact that you are promoting a ponzi scheme in which income is paid to early investors at the expense of investments of those who joined later.

A large team of professionals works in different directions, this ensures a stable income. Analysts always study the market, developers use modern technologies for successful gold mining and mine operations. For a real business, this is an excellent percentage.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Master1PRO on September 18, 2023, 10:19:52 AM...A large team of professionals works in different directions, this ensures a stable income. Analysts always study the market, developers use modern technologies for successful gold mining and mine operations.Yes, I see that the project team is made up of professionals who do not have money. It is obvious that you are one of the "big team of professionals" and the amount of investments received depends on you. But since a serious investor does not believe in your stories, therefore, for this reason they are even ready to accept $10 as an investment.
